schema.description:
集群ID。

您可以调用[ListClusters](~~87116~~)查询集群ID。

是否释放由E-HPC创建的节点。

默认值：true

是否直接删除节点。取值范围：

- true：是

- false：否

Id.description:
要删除的计算节点ID。N的取值范围：1~100

您可以调用[DescribeCluster](~~87126~~)查询指定集群中的节点ID。

TaskId.description:
任务ID。

- 当Sync取值为true，该接口为同步接口。TaskId为Not Available。

- 当Sync取值为false，该接口为异步接口。您可以调用[ListTasks](~~268225~~)查询任务运行结果。

400.errorMessage: You have not enabled this service

403.errorMessage: The operation failed due to invalid cluster status.
The operation failed due to invalid node status.

404.errorMessage: The specified cluster does not exist.
The specified compute node does not exist.
The manager nodes do not exist or their status is abnormal.
The specified object is not found.

406.errorMessage: An error occurred while calling the ECS API operation.
An Alibaba Cloud product error occurred.

407.errorMessage: You are not authorized by RAM for this request.

409.errorMessage: Part of the batch operation failed.

503.errorMessage: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of the server

title: 批量删除计算节点
summary: 调用DeleteNodes删除指定集群中一个或多个计算节点。
description:
## 接口说明
删除节点前，建议您导出节点上所有作业数据，以免因为删除节点而导致数据丢失。
